meanings.definition: The act of leading or presiding over a meeting or organization as the chairperson.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, her chairmanning kept everyone on track.
meanings.sent2: The chairmanning of the board meeting was efficient and effective.
meanings.sent3: His chairmanning style always makes meetings feel productive.
meanings.sent4: She approached chairmanning with a firm hand and a warm heart.
meanings.sent5: The art of chairmanning requires both organization and diplomacy.

meanings.definition: The position or role of being the chairperson of a group or committee.
meanings.sent1: She took on the chairmanning of the committee with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: His dedication to chairmanning the group was evident in every decision.
meanings.sent3: The chairmanning of the book club made reading even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, chairmanning is a key leadership role.
meanings.sent5: The responsibility of chairmanning requires strong communication skills.
